newsitem.title: USA: Chartwell Leisure Q4 EPS loss is $1.47.
newsitem.headline: Chartwell Leisure Q4 EPS loss is $1.47.

text.p: Chartwell Leisure Inc said on Tuesday it had a net loss of $14.5 million, or $1.47 per share, on revenues of $26.9 million for the fourth quarter of 1996.
For full-year 1996, Chartwell had a net loss of $30.1 million, or $4.04 per share, on revenues of $89.0 million.
The company did not provide 1995 figures for comparison. It said it was entirely a gaming company that year but switched in 1996 to the lodging business, so no comparison would be meaningful.
